page.title: 16FAMILY QUESTIONNAIRE
page.content:
YOGHURT, CHOCOLATE BISCUIT, FRUIT JUICE. JANE - COTTAGE CHEESE AND SALAD, BROWN BRIEAD AND BUTTER, FRUIT. TEA - ZARA-MILK SHAKE OR TEA OR FRUIT JUICE, BREAD AND BUTTER ETC. JANE - TEA, BREAD OR CAKE. SUPPER - ZARA-SALAD, BAKED POTATOES, ROAST CHICKEN, ICE CREAM OR YOGHURT. JANE-PASTA, SAUCE AND SALAD, CHEESE AND BISCUITS, CIDER OR BEER.
{FROM EACH MEMBER OF THE HOUSEHOLD- ZARA {(A) ONE HOPE}I HOPE WE WON'T HAVE A NUCLEAR WAR JANE {(A) ONE HOPE} HOPES HER CHILDREN WILL BE DECENT AND HAPPY MEMBERS OF SOCIETY. {(B) ONE WORRY }WORRIES ABOUT THE HEALTH OF HER FAMILY NICK {(A) ONE HOPE }HOPES HIS CHILDREN WILL GROW UP INTO WORTHWHILE {CONT PAGE 17
